description: A staircase leading down to the cellar is flanked on either side by oaken pedestals topped with decorative statuary.  Framed portraits and landscapes done in a variety of styles line the outer wall.  While each piece of art is aesthetically pleasing in its own right, the ensemble as viewed together seems somewhat mismatched.

A staircase leading down to the cellar is flanked on either side by oaken pedestals topped with decorative statuary.  Framed portraits and landscapes done in a variety of styles line the outer wall.  While each piece of art is aesthetically pleasing in its own right, the ensemble as viewed together seems somewhat mismatched.  A small crystal oil lamp hangs from a hook at the top of the stairs, illuminating the descent.
title: [Hallway]
